title: picture of Garen Skill set for 38 RP
body:
Please.... I need 38 RP for a skin in my shop. 
I know this is not garenteed but it will be nice so I'm asking a favor :(

replies.body: Thank you so much! Arigatogozaimashita!!! I WILL FOLLOW DAT FAT RACOON SENSEI EVERYWHERE YOU GO!{{sticker:garen-swing}}
Well it looks like you put a fair amount of effort into this! I'm sure the poros would happily reward you for your art! Just wait patiently for one of them to notice you.
